hero.title: AGIPOCKET
hero.subtitle: The trust bridge between users, digital assets, and AI-driven actions. Define intent, delegate execution, retain full authority.

identity.title: Identity & Ownership
identity.desc: The wallet represents you as the final owner. No matter how autonomous the agent, you hold signing authority.

execution.title: Agent Execution
execution.desc: Enable AI agents to complete complex tasks in bounded permission scopes with human confirmation.

intent.title: Intent & Approval
intent.desc: Translate complex requests into clear decisions. Approve or reject with progressive delegation guardrails.

vision.title: From Apps to Delegated Outcomes
vision.desc: AGIPOCKET is infrastructure for safe autonomous operation where AI can be financially useful without making users financially vulnerable.
